column5: KL Gold stock Looks like its also trying to back test the breakout 5266 triggers long GLD GDX NUGT

PVG Daily KL understandably gets plenty of attention from traders regarding precious mining relative strength but Pretium is another standout Green today and GDX GDXJ come in hard Looking for continued relative outperformance if miner pullback is bought soon
KL bulls love this way too much to let any dip go to waste
I love KL bounce right off the pivot

GLD the volume on the decline looks insignificant and support at 1326 gold is in tact Short term bearish but this may be a good buying opportunity if gold tests higher again which is likely after breaking out of a big handle NUGT KL
SPY from panic last Monday to chasing this Monday Over the short term chasers tend to get punished Used the dip in KL as a buying oppor
KL nice recovery this morning this is one of the best acting miners
